SEARCH
Module OOPCAMSFinalcodes
Package models

Class User

java.lang.Object
models.User
Direct Known Subclasses:
Staff, Student
public class User extends Object
This class represents a generic user in the system. It includes basic user information and functionalities like handling user accounts and passwords.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    User(String i)
    Constructs a User object with a specified user account ID.
    User(String id, String nm, String hashedpwd, String f)
    Constructs a User object with a user account ID, name, hashed password, and faculty as a string.
    User(String id, String nm, String hashedpwd, FACULTIES f)
    Constructs a User object with a user account ID, name, hashed password, and faculty as an enum.

      Constructs a User object with a specified user account ID.

    • User

      public User(String id, String nm, String hashedpwd, String f)
      Constructs a User object with a user account ID, name, hashed password, and faculty as a string.
      Parameters:
      id - the user account ID
      nm - the name of the user
      hashedpwd - the hashed password of the user
      f - the faculty of the user as a string

    • User

      public User(String id, String nm, String hashedpwd, FACULTIES f)
      Constructs a User object with a user account ID, name, hashed password, and faculty as an enum.
      Parameters:
      id - the user account ID
      nm - the name of the user
      hashedpwd - the hashed password of the user
      f - the faculty of the user as an enum

    • getUserName

      public String getUserName()
      Retrieves the username of this user.
      Returns:
      The current username.

    • getUserAccountId

      public String getUserAccountId()
      Retrieves the user account ID of this user.
      Returns:
      The current user account ID.

    • getPassword

      public String getPassword()
      Retrieves the password of this user.
      Returns:
      The current password in hashed format.

    • getFaculty

      public FACULTIES getFaculty()
      Retrieves the faculty to which this user belongs.
      Returns:
      The faculty enumeration of this user.

    • getUserInbox

      public Mailbox getUserInbox()
      Retrieves the mailbox of this user.
      Returns:
      The mailbox associated with this user.

      Sets or updates the username of this user.
      Parameters:
      name - The new username to be set.

    • setUserAccountId

      public void setUserAccountId(String uid)
      Sets or updates the user account ID of this user.
      Parameters:
      uid - The new user account ID to be set.

    • setPasswordFromHashed

      public void setPasswordFromHashed(String newp)
      Sets the user's password using a pre-hashed value.
      Parameters:
      newp - The new hashed password to be set.

    • setPasswordFromUnhashed

      public void setPasswordFromUnhashed(String pw)
      Sets the user's password from an unhashed value. The value is hashed before being set.
      Parameters:
      pw - The unhashed password to be set after hashing.

    • setFaculty

      public void setFaculty(FACULTIES faculty)
      Sets or updates the faculty of this user.
      Parameters:
      faculty - The new faculty enumeration to be set.

    • setUserInbox

      public void setUserInbox(Mailbox userInbox)
      Sets or updates the mailbox of this user.
      Parameters:
      userInbox - The new mailbox to be associated with this user.

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object o)
      Compares this User object with another object for equality. Equality is based on the user account ID.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      o - the object to be compared with
      Returns:
      true if the specified object is a User with the same account ID; false otherwise
